author: Jacalyn Wetzel
title: â€‹Dad discovers child has pinworms and it's freaking people out
text: [Parenting](https://www.upworthy.com/family/parenting/) Dad discovers his child has pinworms and now the entire internet is rethinking parenting Itâ€™s totally common and absolutely gross. If you're a parent you're likely in one of two categories: parents who have never heard of pinworms or parents who shuttered at the headline. Parents are not really given any sort of warning for all of the eyebrow raising situations that occur in childhood and one dad has found out that there was a lot left out of that non-existent parenting handbook. Justin, a dad that runs the [TikTok page drumbeatlane](https://www.tiktok.com/@drumbeatlane) took to social media to tell the world of the current nightmare fuel parenting situation he was experiencing. He's also doing parents on social media a solid by giving them a heads up on the disturbing secret plaguing the parenting worldâ€“pinworms. The viral video starts out with no trigger warning before he says though clenched teeth, "my son has worms in his anus." Yeah, you read that right. It's a thing. A slightly terrifying but totally normal thing. "No one tells you about this stuff when you're thinking about being a parent but apparently it's like super normal for a child to just have worms in his booty hole," Justin says. [Dr. Cerissa Key](https://www.tiktok.com/@therealdrkey), a pediatrician, chimed in on Justin's disturbing revelation and assured him and every parent watching that pinworms are a common thing that happens in young children. But she also dropped some info that other's including Justin may not have been ready to hear. "Justin, sir. I hate to be the bearer of bad news. But if your son has worms in his booty hole, sir, politely and respectfully, you also have worms in your booty hole," Key reveals. Key goes on to explain that kids are "disgusting" and don't wash their hands well so pinworms spread easily if a child at school or daycare has them. She advises that parents stock up on the chalky banana flavored medication that clears them up and to wash everything on hot while being sure to vacuum your floors well. [@drumbeatlane] Parenting truly is just one surprise after another. But the biggest surprise to me every time something crazy happens is that it is usually super common, just no one talks about it. So Iâ€™m warning you. Your child might get worms in their anus. #justinkellough #dadsoftiktok #parentsoftiktok #momsoftiktok #parentingadvice #parenting @Justin People in the comment section of both videos were horrified that this was an actual thing while others commiserated with the stressed dad. "I have no kids and now I'm paranoid I have pinworms with no symptoms," one person writes. "I've raised 4 kids and never had this happen. Tomorrow this will be my entry on my gratitude journal," a mom confesses. "Do I have kids? No...Do I even work around kids? Also no...do I still have the urge to take this medicine just in case anyways? 1 %," someone says. [@therealdrkey] #stitch with @Justin A about pinworms! It your kid has them, YOU have them. ğŸ˜© #pinworms #pinworm #pediatrician #momlife #itchybottom #itchyvulva #pinwormssuck #parenting Not everyone was stressed, some were thankful for the information. "Thank you! We haven't experienced pinworms yet, but super informative and helps to make parenting normalized," another commenter writes. Key suggests that if your child has pinworms that the entire family should take a dose of the medication two weeks apart to make sure any left over newly hatched eggs are also killed. While you may not have been warned about pinworms, no one ever said parenting would be glamorous. It just seems people weren't prepared for how unglamorous it could get.

author: RedaÃ§Ã£o
title: Deslizamento de terra faz cidade da CalifÃ³rnia se mover direto para o Oceano
text:
Cientistas do LaboratÃ³rio de PropulsÃ£o a Jato (JPL) da NASA identificaram que uma cidade localizada na PenÃ­nsula de Palos Verdes, no sul da CalifÃ³rnia, estÃ¡ enfrentando um deslizamento de terra significativo.
A instabilidade do solo na Ã¡rea, observada com o uso de radar de alta precisÃ£o, tem levado a um deslocamento que pode comprometer a seguranÃ§a da regiÃ£o, com movimentos de atÃ© 10 centÃ­metros por semana.
O fenÃ´meno, que jÃ¡ ocorre hÃ¡ mais de seis dÃ©cadas, apresentou uma aceleraÃ§Ã£o notÃ¡vel nos Ãºltimos tempos, especialmente apÃ³s as fortes chuvas de 2023 e o inverno chuvoso de 2024.
Estes eventos climÃ¡ticos intensificados provavelmente tÃªm contribuÃ­do para o agravamento da instabilidade do solo, gerando preocupaÃ§Ãµes entre especialistas e autoridades locais.
Tecnologias AvanÃ§adas Monitoram Movimento do Solo
A NASA utilizou a tecnologia de radar UAVSAR (Unmanned Aerial Vehicle Synthetic Aperture Radar) para monitorar o deslocamento do solo na regiÃ£o com alta precisÃ£o.
Entre 18 de setembro e 17 de outubro de 2024, uma aeronave Gulfstream III foi enviada para sobrevoar a Ã¡rea quatro vezes, coletando dados tridimensionais que permitiram uma anÃ¡lise detalhada da situaÃ§Ã£o.
AlÃ©m disso, satÃ©lites Sentinel-1A e 1B, da AgÃªncia Espacial Europeia (ESA), contribuÃ­ram com informaÃ§Ãµes adicionais.
Os dados capturados por esses satÃ©lites permitiram a geraÃ§Ã£o de mapas que destacam Ã¡reas com deslocamento acelerado, as quais foram indicadas por cores escuras.
Esses mapas foram compartilhados com as autoridades da CalifÃ³rnia e tambÃ©m disponibilizados no Portal de Mapeamento de Desastres da NASA, uma ferramenta essencial para monitorar e mitigar desastres naturais.
A aceleraÃ§Ã£o do deslizamento tem causado preocupaÃ§Ã£o nÃ£o apenas em termos de seguranÃ§a, mas tambÃ©m pela possibilidade de que o movimento do solo possa comprometer a infraestrutura local e levar Ã¡reas inteiras da cidade em direÃ§Ã£o ao oceano, caso a tendÃªncia continue. Autoridades locais estÃ£o monitorando a situaÃ§Ã£o de perto, embora nÃ£o haja medidas definitivas para conter o processo.
Caso Similar no Brasil Aumenta PreocupaÃ§Ãµes sobre ErosÃ£o Costeira
Em outro caso de erosÃ£o costeira, em Atafona, distrito de SÃ£o JoÃ£o da Barra, no Rio de Janeiro, o fenÃ´meno tem se intensificado nas Ãºltimas dÃ©cadas.
O nÃ­vel do mar na regiÃ£o jÃ¡ subiu 13 cm, e especialistas preveem que o aumento chegarÃ¡ a 16 cm atÃ© 2050. A elevaÃ§Ã£o do nÃ­vel do mar tem causado danos significativos Ã  comunidade local, com casas submersas e pescadores sem meios de sustento.
A erosÃ£o costeira em Atafona, que se iniciou na dÃ©cada de 1950, tem se acelerado nos Ãºltimos anos, destruindo mais de 500 residÃªncias e forÃ§ando a migraÃ§Ã£o de mais de 2.000 pessoas.
A crescente perda de territÃ³rio e a escassez de soluÃ§Ãµes efetivas tÃªm gerado crescente pressÃ£o sobre as autoridades para que adotem medidas mais eficazes, embora o problema se mostre complexo e sem soluÃ§Ãµes simples.
O geÃ³grafo Dieter Muehe, especialista em erosÃ£o costeira, alertou para o aumento do avanÃ§o do mar em Ã¡reas como Atafona, que ocorre a uma mÃ©dia de 3 metros por ano.
Muehe ressaltou que esse processo de erosÃ£o tem sido exacerbado pela interaÃ§Ã£o entre atividades humanas e as mudanÃ§as climÃ¡ticas, e que o impacto na regiÃ£o provavelmente continuarÃ¡ nos prÃ³ximos anos, levando a mais danos Ã s infraestruturas e Ã  populaÃ§Ã£o local.
ImplicaÃ§Ãµes para as Comunidades Costeiras
Esses dois casos, um na CalifÃ³rnia e o outro no Brasil, ilustram o impacto crescente da erosÃ£o costeira e dos deslizamentos de terra nas comunidades litorÃ¢neas.
A interaÃ§Ã£o entre mudanÃ§as climÃ¡ticas, aumento do nÃ­vel do mar e eventos climÃ¡ticos extremos tem acelerado esses processos, colocando em risco a seguranÃ§a e a subsistÃªncia de muitas pessoas que vivem nessas regiÃµes.
Especialistas alertam para a necessidade de medidas preventivas e soluÃ§Ãµes adaptativas para lidar com essas questÃµes.
Embora os mÃ©todos tradicionais de mitigaÃ§Ã£o, como a construÃ§Ã£o de barreiras e a contenÃ§Ã£o de encostas, possam ajudar a minimizar os danos em algumas Ã¡reas, a constante evoluÃ§Ã£o desses fenÃ´menos requer uma abordagem mais ampla e integrada.
As autoridades locais e internacionais devem priorizar a pesquisa cientÃ­fica e a implementaÃ§Ã£o de polÃ­ticas pÃºblicas que busquem mitigar os efeitos do avanÃ§o do mar e dos deslizamentos de terra, protegendo tanto as comunidades quanto a infraestrutura crÃ­tica.
Tanto a cidade da CalifÃ³rnia quanto a regiÃ£o de Atafona enfrentam desafios considerÃ¡veis, com suas populaÃ§Ãµes lidando com a ameaÃ§a constante de desastres naturais.
A comunidade cientÃ­fica continua a monitorar a situaÃ§Ã£o e a buscar soluÃ§Ãµes eficazes, mas os prÃ³ximos anos serÃ£o cruciais para determinar o futuro dessas regiÃµes afetadas.

author: Megan Quinn
title: Mom Forces Her Whole Family To Share One Stick Of Deodorant Despite Her Husband Begging For His Own
text:
Mom Forces Her Whole Family To Share One Stick Of Deodorant Despite Her Husband Begging For His Own
She claims that it saves them money. However, research suggests it's unsanitary.
A woman blew the minds of internet users after she revealed her controversial family hack for saving money on personal care products.
The mom forces her family to share one stick of deodorant to save money, much to the chagrin of her husband.
The mother, @missusmom, unveiled her shocking revelation in a TikTok video that has been viewed over 1.4 million times. "Do all of the people in your house share deodorant," she asked viewers, "or does each member that wears deodorant have their own stick of deodorant?"
The woman clarified that her husband shares a stick with their son, while she shares a stick with their daughters.
However, her husband recently reached his wit's end regarding her frugal personal care decision.
After getting out of the shower and being unable to find the shared deodorant, her husband asked why their son couldn't just have his own. The woman seemed perplexed by his suggestion.
â€œWhy would he have his own? Iâ€™m not paying for another stick of deodorant,â€ she said.
When
her husband pointed out that it was â€œgrossâ€ for multiple people to share one stick of deodorant, she dismissed his claims, pointing out that she is happy to share deodorant with their daughters.
However, her husband argued that since men generally have more hair under their arms, it was unsanitary for them to share products like deodorant. He insisted that he be able to purchase separate sticks of deodorant for himself and their son.
Still, the woman refused.
â€œIâ€™m not buying five to eight sticks of deodorant every month,â€ she insisted. â€œI would need to put
extra money into our budget.â€
New Africa | Shutterstock
The woman claimed that the specific brand of deodorant they use costs $10 per stick and that she did not want to dish out $60 to $80 on deodorant for her family when she believed it was unnecessary.
â€œAm I crazy and wrong or is he delusional?â€ the woman asked viewers about her husband.
Most commenters argued that it is unsanitary for multiple people to share one deodorant stick and that each person should have their own.
â€œOh no no no... that's like sharing used toilet paper. Just so gross,â€ one TikTok user commented.
â€œToothbrushes, razors, hairbrushes, and deodorant are not a shared product. What if someone had a staph infection or impetigo?â€ another user remarked.
Others did not understand exactly how the woman was saving money by buying one stick of deodorant.
â€œIâ€™m confused. Arenâ€™t you finishing the deodorant twice as fast by sharing anyway? So buying everyone their own would just make you replace less frequently,â€ one commenter astutely wrote.
In a follow-up video, the woman admitted that she had never sat down and calculated the cost of how much it would be if she bought each member of the family their own deodorant stick or determined how frequently they go through them.
She added that all of the girls in the house preferred the same scent, as well as the boys, so it made sense to share one stick. â€œIt doesnâ€™t bother us,â€ the woman claimed.
She further attempted to defend her decision by sharing that everyone in her family applies deodorant to clean armpits. â€œAll of us apply it directly from the shower. Are you people not doing that?" she asked. "Do you not apply [deodorant] directly onto clean armpits after a shower?â€
â€œNobodyâ€™s going in there with sweaty armpits and putting on deodorant. If we have sweaty armpits, weâ€™re taking a shower and then putting it on clean armpits,â€ she continued.
The woman also claimed that since she and her family use clinical-strength deodorant, they do not need to reapply throughout the day.
â€œIt is nothing like sharing used toilet paper. It is nothing like sharing a freaking toothbrush,â€ she said.
In another video, the woman revealed that she lived in a six-person household growing up, and had become accustomed to sharing products like soap, washcloths, and deodorant.
[Mom Calls Parents Who Put Their Kids' Names On School Supplies 'Weird' â€” 'If Someone Should Need Them They Should Have Access To Them'](/self/mom-calls-parents-weird-putting-kids-names-school-supplies?utm_medium=amp-mid-recent-block)
While it may seem like a convenient money-saving hack, doctors warn against sharing deodorant with multiple people, even family members.
Sharing deodorant can easily lead to the transmission of bacteria, skin fungi, and other microbes that harbor the armpits.
Board-certified dermatologist
Dr. Marnie B. Nussbaum told Fresh Monster that sharing deodorant can "leave microscopic cuts in the skin, allowing blood-borne pathogens to be transferred via deodorant."
These blood-borne pathogens include HIV, Hepatitis B and C, and other dangerous conditions.
Despite this information, 35% of Americans report that they are willing to share their antiperspirants with their family members,
per a 2022 Drive Research survey.
Even if we are in dire need of borrowing someone elseâ€™s deodorant, we must keep in mind that they are
called â€œPERSONAL hygieneâ€ products for a reason. Sharing snacks and clothes is one thing. Transferring sweat and skin bacteria is another.
Megan Quinn is a writer at YourTango who covers entertainment and news, self, love, and relationships.

author: Dajhea Jones
title: Agnes Scott $1M grant for PAs, mental health counselors | 11alive.com
text: DECATUR, Ga. â€” Agnes Scott College has secured a substantial boost for its healthcare education initiatives, receiving $1 million in federal funding to help train physician assistants and mental health counselors. This funding comes as part of the 2024 omnibus appropriations bill, signed into law by President Biden on March 23. â€œThis legislation makes strong investments that will lower childcare costs, support small businesses, strengthen rural health care and more,â€ said Senator Warnock, speaking about the Appropriations Act. â€œIâ€™m proud it reflects my commitment to serving Georgians from Rome to Valdosta.â€ With this support, Agnes Scott College aims to prepare more than 160 master's students annually for careers as licensed professional counselors and certified physician assistants by 2027. "We are immensely grateful to Senators Ossoff and Warnock for their support of our work to educate healthcare professionals, especially those who can make a difference in the lives of women and children," said Leocadia I. Zak, president of Agnes Scott College. The grant is specifically allocated to improve equipment, curriculum development, and technological resources required for the college's physician assistant and clinical mental health counseling graduate programs. The College introduced a clinical mental health counseling program in 2022 and plans to establish a physician assistant program in 2025.

author: Donna Williams
title: Three lost hikers rescued in Finestrat Â« Euro Weekly News
text: Swift action was taken by the Provincial Consortium of Firefighters, who promptly rescued three hikers from the Puig Campana mountain on Friday June 21. Firefighters were initially called upon to rescue two girls in their twenties when they became lost while hiking in the mountain. Less than an hour later, a further report was received from a man in his forties who had become disorientated while disembarking the summit. The first warning was received at 1.43pm, and the Provincial Consortium helicopter, operating with remarkable efficiency, was despatched. It successfully reached the two girls and pulled them to safety via a triangle and a sling. The helicopter, heading to San Vincente del Raspeig fire station, was then called into action again when a second alert was received at 2.50pm. In order to provide assistance as quickly as possible, the aircraft turned around and landed at the heliport in Finestrat, leaving the rescued girls in the care of the Guardia Civil. It then returned to Puig Campana â€“ the highest mountain in Benidorm â€“ successfully locating and rescuing the German man. He was taken to Coll del Pouet where his wife was waiting for him. Fortunately, all three hikers emerged from the ordeal unscathed, a testament to the swift and effective response of the emergency services. Thank you for taking the time to read this article. Do remember to come back and check The Euro Weekly News website for all your up-to-date local and international news stories and remember, you can also follow us on Facebook and Instagram. Share this story Subscribe to our Euro Weekly News alerts to get the latest stories into your inbox! By signing up, you will create a Euro Weekly News account if you don't already have one. author: VNExplorer
title: Imtiaz Ali says he was â€˜movedâ€™ when he read Rig Veda and Bhagavad Gita as a child: â€˜I understand people betterâ€™
text: Imtiaz Ali calls holy texts 'interesting and entertaining'. â€˜I was very movedâ€™ Imtiaz reveals that he was reading a book which had the hymn of creation from Rig Veda right in the beginning and he was moved by it. â€œI couldnâ€™t move past it; I understood what it meant. Bhagavad Gita has also been an important book in my life, itâ€™s still that book I keep on my table. In sixth grade, I was travelling alone by train and money was tight. And ironically it was the only book I could afford to buy at the railway station. I also thought people around me would find it weird and wonder why I was reading it,â€ he said. â€˜Iâ€™m after the simplicity of expressionâ€™ Imtiaz also shared that when he started reading Bhagavad Gita, he was surprised by how easy it was to understand. â€œThere were a few things I had to re-read ten times to understand, but I understood it. I would read a few pages every day. Itâ€™s now deep within me; I'm lucky I was exposed at such a young age. It has helped me understand people better. Iâ€™ve read other religious texts too. Theyâ€™re interesting and entertaining, if I find a nugget that resonates with me, it makes my day,â€ he said. Recent work Imtiaz recently directed Amar Singh Chamkila, which starred Diljit Dosanjh and Parineeti Chopra in the lead roles. The film, which was released on Netflix, is a biographical drama based on the life of the Punjabi singer. It charts the rise to fame and assassination of the titular performer and his wife, Amarjot Kaur. The film received good reviews from fans and critics. Read more news like this on HindustanTimes.com

author: Correspondant
title: Saint-Jory. Les gÃ©nÃ©rations rÃ©unies pour cÃ©lÃ©brer NoÃ«l en musique - ladepeche.fr
text:
Le dimanche 17 dÃ©cembre, lâ€™Ã‰glise de Saint-Jory vibrait aux notes amples et chaleureuses des chants de NoÃ«l de lâ€™ensemble Vocal Colors. En guise de trait dâ€™union entre lâ€™ancienne chargÃ©e de culture et la nouvelle Ã©quipe, Victor Denouvion accompagnÃ© de Marie-Ange Chemin, conseillÃ¨re dÃ©lÃ©guÃ©e, a tenu Ã  remercier Martine Agasse et Sophie Meulet pour lâ€™organisation de ce magnifique Ã©vÃ©nement offert aux Saint-Joryens par la municipalitÃ©. DÃ¨s 15 h 45, on observait une affluence rÃ©guliÃ¨re, Ã  16 h 30, face Ã  une Ã‰glise comble, les retardataires nâ€™avaient dâ€™autres choix que de sâ€™amasser au fond, debout.
Lâ€™Ã©vÃ¨nement a rassemblÃ© un large public de plusieurs gÃ©nÃ©rations. De jeunes parents, misant sur la magie des chants pour captiver les enfants les plus remuants, avaient fait le dÃ©placement ; confiance qui nâ€™a pas Ã©tÃ© dÃ©mentie. Chants et musiques ont embarquÃ© petits et grands. Kathy BoyÃ© a bien vite tissÃ© son lien avec le public et trÃ¨s vite, les paroles anglaises nâ€™Ã©taient plus une difficultÃ© pour personne, toutes et tous fredonnaient, exhortÃ©s par la dynamique Kathy.
EnracinÃ© dans la culture noire amÃ©ricaine, les premiÃ¨res traces du Gospel Ã©taient les chants a cappella des esclaves dans les champs de coton. Câ€™est au XVIIIe siÃ¨cle, avec le chant des priÃ¨res et des sermons que se dÃ©veloppe la tradition du Negro-Spiritual, expression de foi et dâ€™espÃ©rance malgrÃ© les Ã©preuves et les souffrances, portÃ© par une structure musicale simple et des refrains rÃ©pÃ©titifs. AprÃ¨s lâ€™abolition de lâ€™esclavage aux Ã‰tats-Unis en 1865, des ensembles vocaux ont enrichi le style musical caractÃ©risÃ© avec des harmonies vocales complexes et une expressivitÃ© Ã©motionnelle intense. Aujourdâ€™hui encore, le style du Gospel sâ€™enrichit des influences de blues et de jazz donnant naissance Ã  une musique riche et profonde interpellant les Ã©motions.
Le public, entraÃ®nÃ© par la ferveur transmise par les chÅ“urs et les solistes, sâ€™est levÃ© comme pour rendre palpable sa communion avec lâ€™espoir portÃ© par les chants en ces pÃ©riodes de fÃªtes. La foule Ã©tait animÃ©e par lâ€™envie de vivre lâ€™intensitÃ© du moment.
Plus tard, aprÃ¨s des envolÃ©es lyriques superbes, ce sont les bras qui sâ€™Ã©levaient en rythme et formaient une ondulation parfaite pour accompagner lâ€™allÃ©gresse des chants.
Kathy Boye, dont lâ€™association Eureka Live est axÃ©e sur le chant, la musique, la sonothÃ©rapie, lâ€™harmonie et le bien-Ãªtre par les sons, a prÃ©sentÃ© avec son ensemble de Gospel Vocal Colors, bien plus quâ€™un spectacle rÃ©jouissant. Elle a offert Ã  la salle comble une sÃ©ance de bien Ãªtre. La musique et les chants peuvent, en effet, agir comme un puissant antidote au stress, la participation active aux chants, avec des mouvements des bras du corps, des fredonnements ont des bienfaits reconnus sur lâ€™humeur. Si les Saint-Joryens Ã©taient venus chercher un simple et beau concert de NoÃ«l, ils sont ressortis radieux, dÃ©tendus, portant en eux les promesses de belles fÃªtes mais aussi emplis de lâ€™Ã©nergie de cette musique positive. Le final rÃ©jouissant de Happy Days, scandÃ© Ã  lâ€™unisson par les battements de mains des spectateurs, a clÃ´turÃ© le concert dans une ambiance de joie irrÃ©sistible et communicative, laissant Ã  chacun le sourire aux lÃ¨vres et une petite phrase dâ€™Oscar Wilde Ã  lâ€™esprit : "La musique met lâ€™Ã¢me en harmonie avec tout ce qui existe".

author: VNExplorer
title: Querida conductora se descompensa y luego se DESPLOMA en vivo
text:
Pamela Villanueva, conductora de Telediario MediodÃ­a, se desmayÃ³ en plena transmisiÃ³n en vivo este 28 de diciembre del presente aÃ±o. El video sucediÃ³ en vivo, cuando la comunicadora sufriÃ³ una descompensaciÃ³n, se balanceÃ³ y cayÃ³ al piso de manera inmediata.
Aunque al principio el pÃºblico creyÃ³ que era una broma por el DÃ­a de los Inocentes, los comunicadores Erik Solheim y Sandra GonzÃ¡lez expresaron que fue verdad y que Pamela Villanueva fue atendida por el equipo mÃ©dico de manera inmediata.
â€œEs importante mencionar antes de la pausa nuestra compaÃ±era se sintiÃ³ un poco mal, pero afortunadamente se dio la intervenciÃ³n de los paramÃ©dicos de canal, se encuentra bien. Se encuentra bien, por recomendaciÃ³n mÃ©dica regresarÃ¡ al aire el dÃ­a de maÃ±ana, es deber de nosotros actualizar su estado de salud, pues todos nos asustamos cuando ocurriÃ³â€, dijo Erik Solheim.
â€œTuvimos una situaciÃ³n de emergencia, estamos completamente en vivo, estas cosas pueden pasar, estÃ¡ siendo atendida, gracias a la gente que ha estado preguntando por ellaâ€, seÃ±alÃ³ Sandra GonzÃ¡lez.
Querida presentadora sufre desmayo en vivo por no desayunar bien (Instagram)
Pamela Villanueva actualiza su estado de salud Horas despuÃ©s, Pamela Villanueva se enlazÃ³ a Telediario y actualizÃ³ su estado de salud. La comunicadora adelantÃ³ que regresara al trabajo el dÃ­a de maÃ±ana, ademÃ¡s de que agradeciÃ³ por recibir la ayuda adecuada y expresar que se harÃ¡ estudios de sangre para descartar o prevenir enfermedades.
â€œNo fue una broma, me desvanecÃ­, por fortuna no pasÃ³ a mayores, no hubo un desmayo como tal, me brindaron de inmediato la atenciÃ³n el doctor y paramÃ©dicos de Multimedios. Me harÃ© unos anÃ¡lisis, estoy bien de salud, gracias por los que se preocuparon, maÃ±ana nos reincorporamos a trabajar, fue una descompensaciÃ³nâ€, aÃ±adiÃ³.
Pamela expresÃ³ que no desayunÃ³ correctamente en la maÃ±ana, cosa que habrÃ­a provocado su desmayo. AdemÃ¡s, Villanueva agradeciÃ³ al camarÃ³grafo Juan Diego por dejar sus aparatos a un lado y cacharla, pues evitÃ³ que el golpe fuera mucho mayor: â€œGracias al staff por su reacciÃ³n, Juan Dios evitÃ³ que no me fuera a golpear la cabeza, no pasÃ³ a mayores y estoy bienâ€.
